channel.title: Trying to make the npc guy stay
channel.description: Yes, i made a rare_shop in my server with npc 545 and i did everything correct but everytime i restart the server and turn it back on he is gone where i put him what is going on ?

item.title: Trying to make the npc guy stay
item.dc:creator: @skillnocb skillnocb
item.description:
@skillnocb wrote:

Did you do ::npc to spawn him? if you did well thats just until you restart server but if you want him to stay, well you gotta go to spawnconfig.cfg and if you have Delta server you go to autospawn.cfg

Tell me if you have more issues.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to make the npc guy stay

item.title: Trying to make the npc guy stay
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

did you put him in your autospawn.cfg/spawn-config.cfg

Read full topic
